titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the christening of a certaine Iew at London by Iohn Foxe. Conteining an exposition of the xi. chapter of S. Paul to the Romanes. Translated out of Latine into English by Iames Bell.
De oliva evangelica. Concio, in baptismo Judæi. English
titleStmt.author: Foxe, John, 1516-1587.

titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the christening of a certaine Iew at London by Iohn Foxe. Conteining an exposition of the xi. chapter of S. Paul to the Romanes. Translated out of Latine into English by Iames Bell.
De oliva evangelica. Concio, in baptismo Judæi. English
titleStmt.author: Foxe, John, 1516-1587.
Bell, James, fl. 1551-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes Maiestie, at the signe of the Tygres head in Pater noster Rowe,

notesStmt.note: A translation, by James Bell, of: De oliva evangelica. Concio, in baptismo Judæi.
"The confession of faith, which Nathanael a Iewe borne, made .." has caption title.
The Confession is translated from Spanish.--STC.
Running title reads: A sermon preached at the baptisme of a Iewe.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
